author: Simon Difford
description: Rounded, citrusy and delicately spicy with an attractive underlying funk from Swedish punch.
name: Dr. Rieux
recipeIngredient: 30 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled and rimmed glass
